CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper October 17, 1953, pg. 27, reads: "Powerful Har-Brack - Eleven of the reasons why Har-Brack High School's football team is rated as one of the toughest grid teams in Western Pennsylvania is shown above.  The team is currently unbeaten and are favored to win another game this week when they play Ambridge.  Members of the team are, left to right, front row, Marwin Davis, end; Charles Krochich, tackle; Paul Widmer, guard; Larry Wildi, Center; Bill Gold, guard; John Blalock, tackle; Dick Stozesieski, end.  Standing, left to right, are Jim Powell, right half; Dick Smith, quarterback; Chester Gilchrist, fullback, and Barry Johnson, left half. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Har-Brack High School football team members kneeling from left: Marwin Davis, Charles Krochich, Paul Widmer, Larry Wildi, Bill Gold, John Blalock, Dick Stozesieski; standing: Jim Powell, Dick Smith, Chester Gilchrist, Barry Johnson, and possibly coach Kenny Karl
